examples.en: The opinions of the two experts differ on this issue.
examples.zh: 两位专家在这个问题上的意见有所不同。

examples.en: I differ with you on this point.
examples.zh: 在这个问题上，我与你意见相左。

examples.en: They differed in their approach to solving the problem last week.
examples.zh: 上周，他们在解决问题的方法上有所不同。

examples.en: She differed from her colleagues in opinion during the meeting.
examples.zh: 在会议上，她与同事们意见不同。

examples.en: The two versions have differed in their descriptions of the event.
examples.zh: 这两个版本在描述该事件时有所不同。

examples.en: He has differed from his parents in many aspects since childhood.
examples.zh: 从童年起，他在许多方面都与父母不同。
